title: Perm Banned for Chat offence 10/10
body:
Well thankyou for wasting 1 year of my life on this game ill make sure never to come back to this terrible game which bans you for chat offences.

ps. dont stay on this game because they seriously dont give a shit what you have to say and they dont give a crap about you 

Manufa: my league wouldnt start
Manufa: anyway
Manufa: 0.0
Manufa: sej is dead
Manufa: ...
Manufa: yea i dont like karma support
Manufa: ff at 20
Manufa: karma
Manufa: can u go to another lane
Manufa: sej
Manufa: pls stfu
Manufa: you sound so stupid
Manufa: go support top lane
Manufa: i dont need u
Manufa: an adc is beating riven
Manufa: i never seen that before
Manufa: lol riven
Manufa: riven main
Manufa: thirsty
Manufa: dont take my cs
Manufa: dont come bot
Manufa: i said
Manufa: go support riven
Manufa: if u need xp
Manufa: so do i
Manufa: no shit
Manufa: kid
Manufa: if i kept karma here
Manufa: i was be 2 lvls behind
Manufa: thats why i told her to leave
Manufa: so i would catch up
Manufa: moron
Manufa: we were both 0/2
Manufa: what do u mean how
Manufa: you downy
Manufa: LOL
Manufa: becuase u just took it all
Manufa: you fucktard
Manufa: LOL
Manufa: lcs  here
Manufa: sej
Manufa: no one likes you
Manufa: so stfu
Manufa: riven is 1/4
Manufa: how am i feeding
Manufa: you retar
Manufa: you didnt even gank my lane
Manufa: LOL
Manufa: i said nothing the entire game
Manufa: you just keep saying "bot so bad"
Manufa: you toxic fuck
Manufa: LOL
Manufa: sej your the one who wont stop crying
Manufa: LOL
Manufa: i said karma dont come
Manufa: ikr riven
Manufa: LOL
Manufa: this sej
Manufa: LOL
Manufa: WOW
Manufa: THAT KS
Manufa: this sej is a fucken cocksucker
Manufa: idk he likes to cry alot kog
Manufa: karma
Manufa: r u serious
Manufa: np
Manufa: KARMA
Manufa: HOW
Manufa: ffs
Manufa: stop killing them
Manufa: nice sej carry
Manufa: sej been crying all game
Manufa: thats what babies do
Manufa: LOL
Manufa: last hitting
Manufa: 10/10
Manufa: hahahah
Manufa: good one
Manufa: LOL
Manufa: sej no wonder you ar ebronze
Manufa: LOl
Manufa: your not playing better
Manufa: you downy
Manufa: already killed her
Manufa: sej you know your grammar welldone
Manufa: but you still suck at the game
Manufa: ks 9 kills
Manufa: you have 2 asssists
Manufa: lmfao
Manufa: 2 hahahaha
Manufa: "setup"
Manufa: LOL
Manufa: SETUP BY SEJ
Manufa: cya mf
Manufa: cya
Manufa: riven did u die
Manufa: oh
Manufa: yay
Manufa: wtf
Manufa: for what
Manufa: lol
Manufa: sej is such a whiny bitch
Manufa: lee
Manufa: you see this sej speak in all chat everytime she gets butt hurt
Manufa: oh
Manufa: we have a crybaby sej on our team
Manufa: who wants to lose
Manufa: and sej says his so good
Manufa: yet he walks away when we are fighting
Manufa: 10/10
Manufa: nice sej
Manufa: nice try karma
Manufa: go in
Manufa: lmfao
Manufa: um
Manufa: you kicked me while mid air
Manufa: ty riot
Manufa: sej carry!!!
Manufa: nooo
Manufa: guys i bet that death was my fault
Manufa: ikr
Manufa: LOL
Manufa: tank will kills
Manufa: = gg
Manufa: with*
Manufa: OLOL
Manufa: sej is just a 12vie
Manufa: dont worry
Manufa: xD
Manufa: wow
Manufa: be a child
Manufa: woops
Manufa: gg

replies.body: A permaban suggests that this is not a first time offence

> [{quoted}](name=Beneamata,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fJ7pEIB1,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-09-23T23:00:15.670+0000)
>
> A permaban suggests that this is not a first time offence

This
Are you joking... They perma banned for that.......
Shame, we dont want toxic %%%%s like you playing anyway.

Hi Manufa,

Can you post the URL to the Reform Card you were emailed. 

Looking through the log you are verbally abusing teammates, telling them to shut up, making offensive references to people with disabilities to use as an insult and this escalates during the game.

The later the game goes the more you are hammering your teammates with abuse, which is not an enjoyable experience for them and we see through reports that this is behaviour that the community rejects.

You've also been hit by multiple waves of chat restrictions in the past as well as a 2 week ban a month ago so you really should have reformed your behaviour before now.
I never received any reform card

Yeh you did, you also didn't get this as a first time ban either.

I have NEVER seen any players get perma banned for no reason in all games I have ever played over the years I have been playing online games, and that is a long time.

Players will always try to hide what actually happened and play dumb, but they never get away with it.

FYI - in 3.5 years of playing I have never even got ONE ban, not even for a few hours.
i think i would know if i got reform card it would be in my emails which have no such thing -.-

> [{quoted}](name=Manufa,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fJ7pEIB1,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-09-23T14:58:40.031+0000)

> Manufa: ff at 20
> Manufa: pls stfu
> Manufa: you sound so stupid
> Manufa: dont take my cs
> Manufa: dont come bot
> Manufa: i said
> Manufa: no shit
> Manufa: kid
> Manufa: you downy
> Manufa: you fucktard
> Manufa: no one likes you
> Manufa: so stfu
> Manufa: you retar
> Manufa: you didnt even gank my lane

> Manufa: i said nothing the entire game

> Manufa: you toxic fuck
> Manufa: this sej is a fucken cocksucker
> Manufa: idk he likes to cry alot kog
> Manufa: ffs
> Manufa: sej been crying all game
> Manufa: thats what babies do
> Manufa: sej no wonder you ar ebronze
> Manufa: you downy
> Manufa: who wants to lose
> Manufa: sej is just a 12vie

Everything above was toxic. Also your game was a normal... why do you get so mad https://gyazo.com/7b123571a7990fbb675a927ce8a28695

If I was in charge of banning I'd ban you too. You're not wanted, fuck off :)

Manufa: i said nothing the entire game

...that is the biggest bullshit I can read on that post lol.

> [{quoted}](name=Manufa,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fJ7pEIB1,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-09-23T14:58:40.031+0000)
> Manufa: i said nothing the entire game

Sure, absolutely positive of that one.

Did you even read your own chat?

I hope all players like you get perma banned.

I had a game recently where I said THREE things all game, twice to my team and once in /all, one of my comments was asking if their player had gone AFK (which they did, so it was 5v4), one was referencing my team dying when they were over extending, the other was something pointless about dragon or something.

Someone like OP decided it was a good idea to abuse me, than the enemy started abusing me, and I don't mean 1 or 2 things, constant like OP was doing.

There is no need for it, at all, eventually it comes and bites you in the bum. And in case you are wondering that maybe I am the one to blame, no, no I am not. in 3.5 years I have never once had a ban, therefore nothing I have done right or wrong has been deemed banworthy and therefore, possibly not something I should be abused about.

he didn't deserve a perma tbh.
he didn't use racist or sexist slurs and he didn't tell anyone to kill themselves

> [{quoted}](name=Alfawarrior3,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fJ7pEIB1,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-09-24T02:30:49.699+0000)
>
> he didn't deserve a perma tbh.
> he didn't use racist or sexist slurs and he didn't tell anyone to kill themselves

it's not like this would be his only offence. he had a 2 week ban only a month ago, this is warranted

> [{quoted}](name=Eustace Fysher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fJ7pEIB1,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2015-09-24T02:59:38.887+0000)
>
> it's not like this would be his only offence. he had a 2 week ban only a month ago, this is warranted

he deserved to be banned, yes, but not perma'd. that's like putting someone in jail for life cause they broke into someones house and stole their tv.

> [{quoted}](name=Alfawarrior3,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fJ7pEIB1,comment-id=000800000000,timestamp=2015-09-24T03:36:09.077+0000)
>
> he deserved to be banned, yes, but not perma'd. that's like putting someone in jail for life cause they broke into someones house and stole their tv.

yes but if they'd just been locked up a month ago for that offence and then get out and do it again they deserve to be locked up for life. Society does not have to accept the actions of people like that so why should the league community. Some people will just never learn unless you give them the most severe punishment.
It's not just one action it's a pattern of repeated behaviour that has not stopped even though he has previously been punished
Come on riot, point out this is an average game for this guy and show the bad shit.

On one hand, this is faaar less toxic than some of the idiots I've seen still running around, and it's clear that others in the game were flaming too. On the other hand, you are being toxic from what you've provided, and Riot especially doesn't like comments like 'downy' and 'retarded' it seems. I think a fair outcome would've been to ban you for 2 weeks, or maybe a bit longer if this isn't your first offence, but I think perma ban is a bit strong.
